articles.description: The forward tested positive for coronavirus while on international duty with Egypt
articles.content:
Liverpool ace Mohamed Salah has mild symptoms of coronavirus, as he looks likely to miss the Premier League clash with Leicester City after the international break.

articles.title: Amazon's customer service tweet delivers 'United Ireland' as Twitter goes into meltdown - Belfast Live
articles.description: "Amazon Prime have delivered a United Ireland, and before 6pm on the same day."
articles.content:
A reply from Amazon's customer service account which implied Northern Ireland isn't part of the UK has prompted some witty exchanges on Twitter.
